module.title: Admin: Module Installer
module.description:
Install modules from module sources.
Building on basic module administration, this module allows you to install modules from any defined module source. Installing a modules with needed but not installed related modules will install these needed modules as well.
This module can be extended by: list> - Module Editor - Module Creator <list
This module needs other modules to be installed: list> - Modules Editor (thus Modules, Module Sources, App Instances) <list
